short_summary: This RFP is for procurement of an office software program.  The vendor will be required to provide a fully functional  software program which is on a 'live or die on it's merits' basis.  The licensed software must be site licensed with all necessary hardware & software interface, and must be protected  by a school-enterprise 2.0 Microsoft EDA.
description: The Department of Justice and Attorney General seeks a Centralized Computer Single Solution (CCSS) for developing information and document centre for Cen, IS and Legal (I.S.) for i.e. Training Rm;, Kadstone & Yeracook buildings.  This requirement can be met through a single vendor or a combination of vendors.
